price: He said, “Shall I seek for you a god[46] other than Allah when He has favored you above the worlds?”
arabic: قَالَ أَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ أَبۡغِيكُمۡ إِلَٰهٗا وَهُوَ فَضَّلَكُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla aghayra al-lahi abghīkum ilāhan wahuwa faḍḍalakum ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
